name: Suspicious Export-PfxCertificate
description: Detects Commandlet that is used to export certificates from the local certificate store and sometimes used by threat actors to steal private keys from compromised machines
false_positives: Legitimate certificate exports invoked by administrators or users (depends on processes in the environment - filter if unusable)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:*Export\-PfxCertificate*`
